name: Fred Muratori
bio: Fred Muratori is author of the poetry collections Despite Repeated Warnings (1994), The Spectra (2011), and A Civilization (2014). He earned a BA from Fairfield University and an MFA from the Creative Writing Program at Syracuse University. He has recieved grants from the New York Foundation on the Arts and the Constance H. Saltonstall Foundation and currently works as a bibliographer at the Cornell University Library. He lives in Ithaca, New York.
